Hi All,

We're a medical wearables startup building a lifesaving device for patients with high risk of cardiac arrest.

We're on series B and backed by Google Ventures and Third Rock Ventures. We're currently about 40 people and growing quickly this year.

Our office is in San Francisco about 20 minute walk from Caltrain at 200 Kansas Street. All roles are onsite but many people work remotely a day or two a week.
